verses.verse: וָאָשֻׁ֗ב <S%H7725><s%> And I turned וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> and lifted up עֵינַי֙ <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes וָֽאֶרְאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> and looked וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold אַרְבַּ֤ע <S%H702><s%> four מַרְכָּבוֹת֙ <S%H4818><s%> chariots יֹֽצְא֔וֹת <S%H3318><s%> out מִבֵּ֖ין <S%H996><s%> between שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> from between two הֶֽהָרִ֑ים <S%H2022><s%> mountains וְהֶהָרִ֖ים <S%H2022><s%> and the mountains הָרֵ֥י <S%H2022><s%> [were] mountains נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> of brass

בַּמֶּרְכָּבָ֥ה <S%H4818><s%> chariot הָרִֽאשֹׁנָ֖ה <S%H7223><s%> In the first סוּסִ֣ים <S%H5483><s%> horses אֲדֻמִּ֑ים <S%H122><s%> [were] red וּבַמֶּרְכָּבָ֥ה <S%H4818><s%> chariot הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <S%H8145><s%> and in the second סוּסִ֥ים <S%H5483><s%> horses שְׁחֹרִֽים׃ <S%H7838><s%> black

וּבַמֶּרְכָּבָ֥ה <S%H4818><s%> chariot הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֖ית <S%H7992><s%> And in the third סוּסִ֣ים <S%H5483><s%> horses לְבָנִ֑ים <S%H3836><s%> white וּבַמֶּרְכָּבָה֙ <S%H4818><s%> chariot הָרְבִעִ֔ית <S%H7243><s%> and in the fourth סוּסִ֥ים <S%H5483><s%> horses בְּרֻדִּ֖ים <S%H1261><s%> grisled אֲמֻצִּֽים׃ <S%H554><s%> and bay

וָאַ֙עַן֙ <S%H6030><s%> Then I answered וָֽאֹמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <S%H4397><s%> unto the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> that talked בִּ֑י מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> What אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> are these אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <S%H113><s%> master

וַיַּ֥עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me אֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These אַרְבַּע֙ <S%H702><s%> unto me These [are] the four רֻח֣וֹת <S%H7307><s%> spirits הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the heavens יוֹצְא֕וֹת <S%H3318><s%> which go forth מֵֽהִתְיַצֵּ֖ב <S%H3320><s%> from standing עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> before אֲד֥וֹן <S%H113><s%> before the Lord כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of all the earth

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> of which בָּ֞הּ הַסּוּסִ֣ים <S%H5483><s%> horses הַשְּׁחֹרִ֗ים <S%H7838><s%> The black יֹֽצְאִים֙ <S%H3318><s%> which [are] therein go forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country צָפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> into the north וְהַלְּבָנִ֔ים <S%H3836><s%> and the white יָצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> go forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אַֽחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H310><s%> after וְהַ֨בְּרֻדִּ֔ים <S%H1261><s%> them and the grisled יָצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> go forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country הַתֵּימָֽן׃ <S%H8486><s%> toward the south

וְהָאֲמֻצִּ֣ים <S%H554><s%> And the bay יָצְא֗וּ <S%H3318><s%> went forth וַיְבַקְשׁוּ֙ <S%H1245><s%> and sought לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> that they might walk to and fro לְהִתְהַלֵּ֣ך <S%H1980><s%> walk to and fro בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> through the earth וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said לְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> So they walked to and fro הִתְהַלְּכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> patrol בָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> through the earth וַתִּתְהַלַּ֖כְנָה <S%H1980><s%> patrolled בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> through the earth

וַיַּזְעֵ֣ק <S%H2199><s%> Then cried אֹתִ֔י <S%H854><s%> to me וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> me and spake אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> unto me saying רְאֵ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> Behold הַיּֽוֹצְאִים֙ <S%H3318><s%> these that go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country צָפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> toward the north הֵנִ֥יחוּ <S%H5117><s%> have quieted אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> he upon רוּחִ֖י <S%H7307><s%> my spirit בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country צָפֽוֹן׃ <S%H6828><s%> in the north ס
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

לָק֙וֹחַ֙ <S%H3947><s%> Take מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1473><s%> of [them of] the captivity מֵחֶלְדַּ֕י <S%H2469><s%> [even] of Heldai וּמֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> טוֹבִיָּ֖ה <S%H2900><s%> of Tobijah וּמֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> יְדַֽעְיָ֑ה <S%H3048><s%> and of Jedaiah וּבָאתָ֤ <S%H935><s%> which are come אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thou the same day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> the same וּבָ֗אתָ <S%H935><s%> and come בֵּ֚ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יֹאשִׁיָּ֣ה <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צְפַנְיָ֔ה <S%H6846><s%> of Zephaniah אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> where בָּ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and go מִבָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> from Babylon

וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <S%H3947><s%> Then take כֶֽסֶף־ <S%H3701><s%> silver וְזָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> and gold וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> and make עֲטָר֑וֹת <S%H5850><s%> crowns וְשַׂמְתָּ֗ <S%H7760><s%> and set בְּרֹ֛אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> [them] upon the head יְהוֹשֻׁ֥עַ <S%H3091><s%> of Joshua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹצָדָ֖ק <S%H3087><s%> of Josedech הַכֹּהֵ֥ן <S%H3548><s%> priest הַגָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> the high

וְאָמַרְתָּ֤ <S%H559><s%> And speak אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto him saying כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> Thus speaketh יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold אִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Behold the man צֶ֤מַח <S%H6780><s%> [is] The BRANCH שְׁמוֹ֙ <S%H8034><s%> whose name וּמִתַּחְתָּ֣יו <S%H8478><s%> where יִצְמָ֔ח <S%H6779><s%> and he shall grow up וּבָנָ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> out of his place and he shall build אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֵיכַ֥ל <S%H1964><s%> the temple יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְ֠הוּא <S%H1931><s%> who יִבְנֶ֞ה <S%H1129><s%> Even he shall build אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֵיכַ֤ל <S%H1964><s%> the temple יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> who יִשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> and he shall bear ה֔וֹד <S%H1935><s%> the glory וְיָשַׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> and shall sit וּמָשַׁ֖ל <S%H4910><s%> and rule עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסְא֑וֹ <S%H3678><s%> upon his throne וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> will be a כֹהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> and he shall be a priest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסְא֔וֹ <S%H3678><s%> upon his throne וַעֲצַ֣ת <S%H6098><s%> and the counsel שָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> of peace תִּהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> will be between שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8147><s%> shall be between them both

וְהָעֲטָרֹ֗ת <S%H5850><s%> And the crowns תִּֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> will become לְחֵ֙לֶם֙ <S%H2494><s%> shall be to Helem וּלְטוֹבִיָּ֣ה <S%H2900><s%> and to Tobijah וְלִידַֽעְיָ֔ה <S%H3048><s%> and to Jedaiah וּלְחֵ֖ן <S%H2581><s%> and to Hen בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צְפַנְיָ֑ה <S%H6846><s%> of Zephaniah לְזִכָּר֖וֹן <S%H2146><s%> for a memorial בְּהֵיכַ֥ל <S%H1964><s%> in the temple יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וּרְחוֹקִ֣ים ׀ <S%H7350><s%> And they [that are] far off יָבֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> shall come וּבָנוּ֙ <S%H1129><s%> and build בְּהֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> in the temple יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וִידַעְתֶּ֕ם <S%H3045><s%> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שְׁלָחַ֣נִי <S%H7971><s%> hath sent אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> to וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> will take אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if שָׁמ֣וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> me unto you And [this] shall come to pass if ye will diligently תִּשְׁמְע֔וּן <S%H8085><s%> obey בְּק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God ס
